function.name: call_accounts_agent
function.description: Query account or tenant information. Can lookup account information by account name, tenant id, etc.

task.description: Refined instruction needed to retrieve account data.

function.name: call_ip_address_agent
function.description: Given an IP address or Tenant information, retrieve metadata, history of IP address and can analyze ownership, public/private IP metadata.

task.description: Refined IP lookup instruction based on orchestrator reasoning.

function.name: catalog_agent
function.description: Queries product or service catalog for metadata, versions, and configuration.

catalog_query.description: Item or configuration to lookup from catalog.
